document.full_text: as the doctor rattled off my wife's cancer history, i realized how badly i had misjudged what the year would be like, and how poorly prepared i was for it, writes dr. peter bach.
document.title: hit by the reality of cancer treatment
lines_and_colors: as the doctor rattled off my wife's cancer history, i realized how badly i had misjudged what the year would be like, and how poorly prepared i was for it, writes dr. peter bach.
